channel.title: Advertising
channel.description:
Some things to consider if we want to advertise...Has anyone looked at spawn lately? It looks like complete and udder shit.. "No offense" but when people log on and see that, they will not want to stick around..
The water is broken with currents taking you down all over, cobble/wood/sandstone/etc placed randomly all over the place.
[img]http://aar.im/i/Untit-i3.png[/img] [img]http://aar.im/i/Untit-de.png[/img] [img]http://aar.im/i/Untit-h9.png[/img]

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

omgilikepie:

Good job guys, it looks a lot better now. Who’s up for braving the lava to remove all the cobble from the nether?

Hell no, that cobble looks fine where it is now.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

They will knock you off of a tower of blocks and kill you in a heart beat

Read full topic

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

It’s not the lava I fear, it b dem ghasts!

item.title: Advertising

item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

I’d be willing to do a clean up.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I wouldn’t mine helping either, as long as someone coming along and saying “those random cobble blocks were mine” and getting me banned for griefing lol

Also, I suck at fixing water currents :S

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

How about we all just dedicate 20 minutes of our time to cleaning it up? I don’t mean knocking down houses or anything, just clearing random cobblestone blocks, wood blocks and fixing broken water currents. I’d be happy to help…

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Now I know why they keep coming to my island… those machines is the first thing they see after they leave spawn…

I suggest moving spawn to my temple when it’s done, it will look pretty and people will want to explore it. Thus sticking around long enough to get familiar.

Read full topic
